title: Unintentional Tankers, Melvin Gordon's Return, Cam Newton’s Future, and Week 4 Preview  | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The Redskins, Broncos, and Jets are winless and the panic is starting to set in (2:15). Plus, Saquon’s injury, Melvin Gordon's reporting to L.A., Cam’s future in Carolina, and Josh Allen’s undefeated Bills (24:00). Then, the three biggest games of the week, and a Thursday night preview (38:00).
Hosts: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
